20110113020131.000|20110113020131.000|CC1|MEMORY?

20110113020206.000|20110113020210.000|CC1|OF OUR MENTAL HEALTH SYSTEM.

20110113020306.000|20110113020324.000|CC1|WOUNDS.                         
20110113020324.000|20110113020328.000|CC1|SCRIPTURE TELLS US THAT THERE IS
20110113020328.000|20110113020329.000|CC1|EVIL IN THE WORLD AND THAT

20110113020340.000|20110113020344.000|CC1|LOOKED FOR LIGHT, THEN CAME

20110113020434.000|20110113020448.000|CC1|SUCH VIOLENCE IN THE FUTURE.    
20110113020448.000|20110113020453.000|CC1|BUT WHAT WE CANNOT DO IS USE

20110113020523.000|20110113020526.000|CC1|AS WE DISCUSS THESE ISSUES, LET

20110113020549.000|20110113020551.000|CC1|EMPATHY AND REMIND OURSELVES OF 
20110113020551.000|20110113020555.000|CC1|ALL THE WAYS THAT OUR HOPES AND 
20110113020555.000|20110113020601.000|CC1|DREAMS ARE BOUND TOGETHER.

20110113020633.000|20110113020634.000|CC1|PARENT, WE WONDER.

20110113020640.000|20110113020643.000|CC1|DID WE TELL A SPOUSE JUST HOW   
20110113020643.000|20110113020647.000|CC1|DESPERATELY WE LOVE THEM?

20110113020651.000|20110113020654.000|CC1|EVERY SINGLE DAY.               
20110113020654.000|20110113020656.000|CC1|SO SOME LOSS CAUSES US TO LOOK  
20110113020656.000|20110113020700.000|CC1|BACKWARD, BUT IT ALSO FORCES US 
20110113020700.000|20110113020701.000|CC1|TO LOOK FORWARD, TO REFLECT ON

20110113020738.000|20110113020739.000|CC1|PERHAPS WE QUESTION WHETHER     
20110113020739.000|20110113020743.000|CC1|WE'RE DOING RIGHT BY OUR

20110113020754.000|20110113020756.000|CC1|AND WE ARE REMINDED THAT IN THE 
20110113020756.000|20110113020759.000|CC1|FLEETING TIME WE HAVE ON THIS

20110113020805.000|20110113020809.000|CC1|FAME, BUT RATHER HOW WELL WE    
20110113020809.000|20110113020810.000|CC1|HAVE LOVED.                     
20110113020810.000|20110113020812.000|CC1|AND WHAT SMALL PART WE HAVE     
20110113020812.000|20110113020817.000|CC1|PLAYED IN MAKING THE LIVES OF   
20110113020817.000|20110113020833.000|CC1|OTHER PEOPLE BETTER.            
20110113020833.000|20110113020836.000|CC1|AND THAT PROCESS, THAT PROCESS

20110113021400.000|20110113021403.000|CC1|THAT HOW WE TREAT ONE ANOTHER,  
20110113021403.000|20110113021411.000|CC1|THAT'S ENTIRELY UP TO US.       
20110113021411.000|20110113021412.000|CC1|AND I BELIEVE THAT FOR ALL OUR  
20110113021412.000|20110113021415.000|CC1|IMPERFECTIONS, WE ARE FULL OF

20110113021422.000|20110113021434.000|CC1|UNITE US.                       
20110113021434.000|20110113021435.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT I BELIEVE.          
20110113021435.000|20110113021437.000|CC1|IN PART BECAUSE THAT'S WHAT A   
20110113021437.000|20110113021442.000|CC1|CHILD LIKE CHRISTINA TAYLOR     
20110113021442.000|20110113021448.000|CC1|GREEN BELIEVED.                 
20110113021448.000|20110113021448.000|CC1|IMAGINE.                        
20110113021448.000|20110113021451.000|CC1|IMAGINE FOR A MOMENT, HERE WAS A
20110113021451.000|20110113021455.000|CC1|YOUNG GIRL WHO WAS JUST BECOMING
20110113021455.000|20110113021457.000|CC1|AWARE OF OUR DEMOCRACY, JUST    
20110113021457.000|20110113021501.000|CC1|BEGINNING TO UNDERSTAND THE     
20110113021501.000|20110113021502.000|CC1|OBLIGATIONS OF CITIZENSHIP, JUST
20110113021502.000|20110113021503.000|CC1|STARTING TO GLIMPSE THE FACT    
20110113021503.000|20110113021506.000|CC1|THAT SOME DAY SHE, TOO, MIGHT   
20110113021506.000|20110113021512.000|CC1|PLAY A PART IN SHAPING HER      
20110113021512.000|20110113021512.000|CC1|NATION'S FUTURE.                
20110113021512.000|20110113021516.000|CC1|SHE HAD BEEN ELECTED TO HER     
20110113021516.000|20110113021517.000|CC1|STUDENT COUNCIL.                
20110113021517.000|20110113021519.000|CC1|SHE SAW PUBLIC SERVICE AS       
20110113021519.000|20110113021521.000|CC1|SOMETHING EXCITING AND HOPEFUL. 
20110113021521.000|20110113021524.000|CC1|SHE WAS OFF TO MEET HER

20110113021526.000|20110113021530.000|CC1|SURE WAS GOOD AND IMPORTANT AND 
20110113021530.000|20110113021533.000|CC1|MIGHT BE A ROLE MODEL.          
20110113021533.000|20110113021536.000|CC1|SHE SAW ALL THIS THROUGH THE    
20110113021536.000|20110113021538.000|CC1|EYES OF A CHILD.

20110113023007.000|20110113023010.000|CC1|MANAGED TO REFLECT THE FACT THAT
20110113023010.000|20110113023011.000|CC1|IT TOOK PLACE IN A LARGE        
20110113023011.000|20110113023012.000|CC1|SPORTING ARENA.                 
20110113023012.000|20110113023016.000|CC1|THE CHEERS OF THE CROWD         
20110113023016.000|20110113023016.000|CC1|RESONATING IN THE WAY THEY WOULD
20110113023016.000|20110113023017.000|CC1|AT OTHER TYPES OF EVENTS THAT   
20110113023017.000|20110113023019.000|CC1|ARE USUALLY HELD IN THAT GIANT  
20110113023019.000|20110113023019.000|CC1|SPACE.                          
20110113023019.000|20110113023022.000|CC1|BUT IT ALSO FUNCTIONED AS A     
20110113023022.000|20110113023023.000|CC1|THOUSAND-STRONG SUPPORT GROUP.  
20110113023023.000|20110113023025.000|CC1|LOTS OF PEOPLE WERE HUGGING AS  
20110113023025.000|20110113023025.000|CC1|THEY WENT INSIDE.               
20110113023025.000|20110113023027.000|CC1|LOTS OF CHEERING FROM THE CROWD,
20110113023027.000|20110113023029.000|CC1|EACH TIME SURVIVORS OR THEIR    
20110113023029.000|20110113023032.000|CC1|FAMILIES ARRIVED.               
20110113023032.000|20110113023033.000|CC1|HOMELAND SECURITY SECRETARY     
20110113023033.000|20110113023035.000|CC1|JANET NAPOLITANO, WHO, OF       
20110113023035.000|20110113023037.000|CC1|COURSE, IS THE IMMEDIATE PAST   
20110113023037.000|20110113023038.000|CC1|FORMER GOVERNOR OF ARIZONA, SHE 
20110113023038.000|20110113023039.000|CC1|WAS SITTING TONIGHT WITH        
20110113023039.000|20110113023040.000|CC1|ASTRONAUT MARK KELLY.           
20110113023040.000|20110113023043.000|CC1|MILWAUKEE KELLY IS CONGRESSWOMAN
20110113023043.000|20110113023044.000|CC1|GIFFORDS' HUSBAND.              
20110113023044.000|20110113023044.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT HUGGING CAPTAIN   
20110113023044.000|20110113023046.000|CC1|KELLY WHEN HE ARRIVED A TO THE  
20110113023046.000|20110113023046.000|CC1|SCENE TONIGHT.                  
20110113023046.000|20110113023048.000|CC1|ON THE PRESIDENT'S OTHER SIDE,  
20110113023048.000|20110113023049.000|CC1|THE MAN SITTING RIGHT NEXT TO   
20110113023049.000|20110113023051.000|CC1|HIM, PROBABLY THE BEST SEAT IN  
20110113023051.000|20110113023052.000|CC1|THE HOUSE TONIGHT, THAT WENT TO 
20110113023052.000|20110113023055.000|CC1|DANIEL HERNANDEZ.               
20110113023055.000|20110113023057.000|CC1|DANIEL THE 20-YEAR-OLD INTERN IN
20110113023057.000|20110113023058.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS' OFFICE. 
20110113023058.000|20110113023059.000|CC1|HE HAD BEEN HER INTERN FOR LESS 
20110113023059.000|20110113023100.000|CC1|THAN A WEEK WHEN HE ATTENDED    
20110113023100.000|20110113023101.000|CC1|THIS EVENT.                     
20110113023101.000|20110113023101.000|CC1|WHEN HE HEARD THE SOUND OF      
20110113023101.000|20110113023103.000|CC1|GUNFIRE AT THAT SAFEWAY PARKING 
20110113023103.000|20110113023105.000|CC1|LOT ON SATURDAY MORNING, HE RAN 
20110113023105.000|20110113023108.000|CC1|TOWARD THE SOUND OF THE FIRING  
20110113023108.000|20110113023108.000|CC1|GUN.                            
20110113023108.000|20110113023109.000|CC1|HE ADMINISTERED CRITICAL FIRST  
20110113023109.000|20110113023110.000|CC1|AID TO THE CONGRESSWOMAN UNTIL  
20110113023110.000|20110113023111.000|CC1|PARAMEDICS ARRIVED.             
20110113023111.000|20110113023114.000|CC1|MR. HERNANDEZ IS CREDITED WITH  
20110113023114.000|20110113023115.000|CC1|SAVING THE CONGRESSWOMAN'S LIFE.
20110113023115.000|20110113023122.000|CC1|ON THE PRESIDENT'S OTHER SIDE   
20110113023122.000|20110113023122.000|CC1|WAS FORMER SUPREME COURT JUDGE, 
20110113023122.000|20110113023123.000|CC1|SANDRA DAY O'CONNOR.            
20110113023123.000|20110113023131.000|CC1|AND WHEN MR. HERNANDEZ WAS      
20110113023131.000|20110113023132.000|CC1|RECOGNIZED TONIGHT, HE RECEIVED 
20110113023132.000|20110113023134.000|CC1|A HUGE STANDING OVATION FROM THE
20110113023134.000|20110113023134.000|CC1|CROWD.                          
20110113023134.000|20110113023138.000|CC1|>> ALTHOUGH I APPRECIATE THE    
20110113023138.000|20110113023139.000|CC1|SENTIMENT, I MUST HUMBLY REJECT 
20110113023139.000|20110113023140.000|CC1|THE USE OF THE WORD "HERO,"     
20110113023140.000|20110113023141.000|CC1|BECAUSE I AM NOT ONE.           
20110113023141.000|20110113023142.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE THAT ARE HEROES ARE  
20110113023142.000|20110113023144.000|CC1|PEOPLE LIKE PAM SIMON,          
20110113023144.000|20110113023145.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE         
20110113023145.000|20110113023148.000|CC1|GIFFORDS, GABE SIMMERMAN, WHO   
20110113023148.000|20110113023150.000|CC1|UNFORTUNATELY, WE LOST THAT DAY,
20110113023150.000|20110113023153.000|CC1|RON BARBER, THE FIRST           
20110113023153.000|20110113023155.000|CC1|RESPONDERS, AND ALSO PEOPLE LIKE
20110113023155.000|20110113023156.000|CC1|DR. RHEE WHO HAVE DONE AN       
20110113023156.000|20110113023159.000|CC1|AMAZING JOB AT MAKING SURE THAT 
20110113023159.000|20110113023201.000|CC1|GABBY IS OKAY AND THOSE WHO ARE 
20110113023201.000|20110113023202.000|CC1|INJURED ARE BEING TREATED TO THE
20110113023202.000|20110113023209.000|CC1|BEST OF OUR ABILITY.            
20110113023209.000|20110113023209.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20110113023209.000|20110113023210.000|CC1|>> I SHOULD SAY THAT DANIEL     
20110113023210.000|20110113023211.000|CC1|HERNANDEZ WILL BE A GUEST, A    
20110113023211.000|20110113023214.000|CC1|LIVE GUEST ON "COUNTDOWN" LATER

20110113023216.000|20110113023218.000|CC1|AS MR. HERNANDEZ, AS YOU HEARD

20110113023222.000|20110113023225.000|CC1|HERO, SO TOO DID EVERYONE INSIDE
20110113023225.000|20110113023226.000|CC1|THE ARENA SEEM TO REJECT

20110113023227.000|20110113023228.000|CC1|AS I MENTIONED, THIS TOOK PLACE 
20110113023228.000|20110113023232.000|CC1|IN A SPORTS ARENA AND THE CROWD 
20110113023232.000|20110113023234.000|CC1|CHEERING AT THE EVENT.          
20110113023234.000|20110113023236.000|CC1|IT WAS, I THINK, AN IMPORTANT   
20110113023236.000|20110113023237.000|CC1|STATEMENT, ULTIMATELY, ABOUT THE
20110113023237.000|20110113023238.000|CC1|CHARACTER OF THIS EVENT.        
20110113023238.000|20110113023240.000|CC1|THE CROWD CHEERING, NOT JUST THE
20110113023240.000|20110113023244.000|CC1|ARRIVALS, BUT MENTIONS OF

20110113023244.000|20110113023246.000|CC1|HERITAGE OF THE NATIVE AMERICAN 
20110113023246.000|20110113023248.000|CC1|PROFESSOR, WHO LED THE BLESSING 
20110113023248.000|20110113023249.000|CC1|AT THE BEGINNING OF THE SERVICE.
20110113023249.000|20110113023253.000|CC1|THE CROWD EQUALLY CHEERING WITH 
20110113023253.000|20110113023259.000|CC1|EQUAL FERVENTSY JAN BREWER, WHO 
20110113023259.000|20110113023302.000|CC1|HAS BEEN A LIGHTNING ROD OF     
20110113023302.000|20110113023304.000|CC1|CRITICISM FOR THE IMMIGRATION   
20110113023304.000|20110113023304.000|CC1|BILL.

20110113023306.000|20110113023308.000|CC1|FIERCELY CRITICAL AND

20110113023308.000|20110113023312.000|CC1|OBAMA ON POLITICAL MATTERS.

20110113023314.000|20110113023315.000|CC1|OFFERING THE PRESIDENT THANKS

20110113023317.000|20110113023318.000|CC1|GOVERNOR BREWER AND PRESIDENT   
20110113023318.000|20110113023320.000|CC1|OBAMA REPRESENTING NOTHING SO   
20110113023320.000|20110113023323.000|CC1|MUCH AS A UNITED FRONT AS PUBLIC
20110113023323.000|20110113023324.000|CC1|SERVANTS AND AS POLITICAL

20110113023326.000|20110113023327.000|CC1|A CIRCUMSTANCE POLITICALLY      
20110113023327.000|20110113023329.000|CC1|IMPOSSIBLE TO IMAGINE, BUT ONE  
20110113023329.000|20110113023331.000|CC1|MADE POSSIBLE BY THE GRAVITY OF 
20110113023331.000|20110113023332.000|CC1|THIS TRAGEDY.                   
20110113023332.000|20110113023334.000|CC1|AT TIMES, AS I SAY, ESPECIALLY  
20110113023334.000|20110113023336.000|CC1|AT FIRST, THE CHEERING TONIGHT  
20110113023336.000|20110113023339.000|CC1|WAS ALMOST UNSETTLING, BECAUSE  
20110113023339.000|20110113023341.000|CC1|THIS WAS A MEMORIAL EVENT, BUT  
20110113023341.000|20110113023344.000|CC1|ULTIMATELY, THE CHEERING CROWDS

20110113023353.000|20110113023354.000|CC1|INCLUDING, OF COURSE, FROM      
20110113023354.000|20110113023356.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA, A DESCRIPTION  
20110113023356.000|20110113023358.000|CC1|OF EXACTLY WHAT IT WAS, A       
20110113023358.000|20110113023359.000|CC1|GUNMAN'S BULLETS INTERRUPTED    
20110113023359.000|20110113023402.000|CC1|THAT SATURDAY MORNING.          
20110113023402.000|20110113023408.000|CC1|>> ON SATURDAY MORNING, GABBY,

20110113023457.000|20110113023501.000|CC1|OF GOVERNMENT OF AND BY AND FOR

20110113023511.000|20110113023513.000|CC1|>> THE PRESIDENT GIVING LONG,   
20110113023513.000|20110113023515.000|CC1|DETAILED DESCRIPTIONS TONIGHT OF
20110113023515.000|20110113023516.000|CC1|EACH OF THE VICTIMS OF THE

20110113023520.000|20110113023521.000|CC1|REMEMBER THE FAMILIES THEY HAVE

20110113023529.000|20110113023531.000|CC1|CHRISTINA TAYLOR GREEN.

20110113023600.000|20110113023603.000|CC1|LIFE UNCOMMON FOR A GIRL HER    
20110113023603.000|20110113023603.000|CC1|AGE.

20110113023607.000|20110113023610.000|CC1|SO BLESSED.

20110113023800.000|20110113023801.000|CC1|ARE HERE!

20110113023806.000|20110113023809.000|CC1|WE ARE THERE FOR HER!           
20110113023809.000|20110113023811.000|CC1|>> THE PRESIDENT, I THINK,      
20110113023811.000|20110113023813.000|CC1|ACTUALLY MAKING NEWS THERE WITH 
20110113023813.000|20110113023814.000|CC1|NEWS OF PROGRESS IN THE

20110113023818.000|20110113023819.000|CC1|DEPARTURE FROM HIS PREPARED     
20110113023819.000|20110113023819.000|CC1|STATEMENT.                      
20110113023819.000|20110113023820.000|CC1|THE CROWD AT THE EVENT TONIGHT

20110113023823.000|20110113023825.000|CC1|SINGLED OUT HEROES OF THE

20110113023827.000|20110113023828.000|CC1|STEPPED FORWARD THAT DAY.       
20110113023828.000|20110113023831.000|CC1|HE TOLD DANIEL HERNANDEZ THAT NO
20110113023831.000|20110113023833.000|CC1|MATTER THAT MR. HERNANDEZ DID   
20110113023833.000|20110113023835.000|CC1|NOT WANT TO BE CONSIDERED A     
20110113023835.000|20110113023836.000|CC1|HERO, HE WOULD BE CONSIDERED    
20110113023836.000|20110113023836.000|CC1|ONE.                            
20110113023836.000|20110113023838.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT SAYING TONIGHT    
20110113023838.000|20110113023841.000|CC1|THAT A NATIONAL CONVERSATION HAS
20110113023841.000|20110113023841.000|CC1|BEGUN.                          
20110113023841.000|20110113023842.000|CC1|HE SAID, NOT ONLY ABOUT THE     
20110113023842.000|20110113023843.000|CC1|MOTIVATIONS BEHIND THESE        
20110113023843.000|20110113023844.000|CC1|KILLINGS, BUT ABOUT EVERYTHING  
20110113023844.000|20110113023846.000|CC1|FROM THE MERITS OF GUN SAFETY   
20110113023846.000|20110113023848.000|CC1|LAWS TO THE ADEQUACY OF OUR     
20110113023848.000|20110113023850.000|CC1|MENTAL HEALTH SYSTEMS.          
20110113023850.000|20110113023851.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT DECIDING NOT TO   
20110113023851.000|20110113023853.000|CC1|WEIGH IN ON THE MERITS OF THOSE 
20110113023853.000|20110113023854.000|CC1|SPECIFIC DEBATES TONIGHT, NOT AT
20110113023854.000|20110113023855.000|CC1|LEAST IN THIS SETTING.          
20110113023855.000|20110113023858.000|CC1|BUT HE CALLED THE DEBATE THE    
20110113023858.000|20110113023900.000|CC1|ITSELF "AN ESSENTIAL INGREDIENT 
20110113023900.000|20110113023902.000|CC1|IN HER EXERCISE OF              
20110113023902.000|20110113023902.000|CC1|SELF-GOVERNMENT."               
20110113023902.000|20110113023904.000|CC1|OF COURSE, MUCH OF THE NATIONAL 
20110113023904.000|20110113023905.000|CC1|CONVERSATION SINCE THESE        
20110113023905.000|20110113023906.000|CC1|SHOOTINGS HAS BEEN ABOUT NOT    
20110113023906.000|20110113023908.000|CC1|JUST POLICY AND POLITICS, BUT   
20110113023908.000|20110113023909.000|CC1|ABOUT HOW WE AS AMERICANS DEBATE
20110113023909.000|20110113023910.000|CC1|THOSE THINGS.

20110113023915.000|20110113023917.000|CC1|AND WHETHER OR NOT THE TENOR OF 
20110113023917.000|20110113023919.000|CC1|OUR DEBATES IS AT FAULT.        
20110113023919.000|20110113023920.000|CC1|WHETHER IT IS CONNECTED TO      
20110113023920.000|20110113023922.000|CC1|VIOLENCE LIKE THIS.             
20110113023922.000|20110113023923.000|CC1|TO THAT DEBATE, THE PRESIDENT   
20110113023923.000|20110113023927.000|CC1|ADDED THESE COMMENTS.           
20110113023927.000|20110113023931.000|CC1|>> AT A TIME WHEN OUR DISCOURSE 
20110113023931.000|20110113023935.000|CC1|HAS BECOME SO SHARPLY POLARIZED,
20110113023935.000|20110113023938.000|CC1|AT A TIME WHEN WE ARE FOR A TOO

20110113023939.000|20110113023943.000|CC1|THAT AILS THE WORLD AT THE FEET

20110113023959.000|20110113024002.000|CC1|THAT HEALS, NOT IN A WAY THAT

20110113024004.000|20110113024006.000|CC1|>> THE PRESIDENT GOING ON
